2.1 Colors

All the colors.

  • #ffffff; White

    $color-white

  • #3a3a3b; Black

    $color-black

  • #818386; Gray

    $color-gray

  • #0d7e97; Blue

    $color-blue

  • #be2a26; Red

    $color-red

  • #308453; Green

    $color-green

  • #fdb71c; Orange

    $color-orange

  • #5c9999; Teal

    $color-teal
